name: Erdős–Moser equation
summary:
In number theory, the Erdős–Moser equation is

  
    
      
        
          1
          
            k
          
        
        +
        
          2
          
            k
          
        
        +
        ⋯
        +
        (
        m
        −
        1
        
          )
          
            k
          
        
        =
        
          m
          
            k
          
        
        ,
      
    
    {\displaystyle 1^{k}+2^{k}+\cdots +(m-1)^{k}=m^{k},}
